text.autoconfig.reskin.title: Re:Skin Config
text.autoconfig.reskin.option.selfSkinNe: Does setting their own skins need op?
text.autoconfig.reskin.option.othersSkin: Does setting other peoples skins need op?
setskin.clearedcache: Skin cache cleared. Will now re-download all needed skins.
setskin.notwhitelisted: The desired skin url is not from a whitelisted server.
